page.title: 02GENERAL INFORMATION.
page.content: This block of twelve squares covers the village of Woolfardisworthy West, which is locally known by the name of Woolsery, and some of the surrounding farmland. {Woolsery}is situated in the north west of Devon,approximately three miles east of the Cornish border and a similar distance from the Bristol Channel at Bucks Mills,to the north. The village of Woolfardisworthy is in the Torridge District Council area,the Bideford postal area and its telephone numbers are to be found under the Clovelly exchange.It is also in the West Devon parliamentary constituency,Sir Peter Mills is the current member and the Devon European constituency,represented by Lord O'HAGAN.
